title: Fun activities to celebrate your day !
content: Today is a special day that should be celebrated for sure! These activities will feel like a warm hug. You can find all kind of activities that will satisfy all tastes ₊⊹
1. Attend a one-day class try a new hobby.
2. Go thrifting or shopping. Even if you will not buy them, try on clothes and play dress-up in real life.
